ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 506
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yesterday, i feedback ed and petitioned this.  (because of a silly mistake on my part, i thought that they had already nerfed the surfing-- I was running,
ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 1
> Date: Fri, 12 Nov 1999 13:02:53 -0700
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>Subject: RE: OMG! GZ finally replied
>
>But I don't want to stop surfing, does anyone? I think that is one of our
>coolest animations that we surf across the ground as we blaze across Norrath
>in a cacophony of light bubbles. It will be a sad day indeed when even our
>appearance is nerfed. Heaven above forbid bards should look cooler at any
>time than someone else. That might be unbalancing. Never mind that we have
>a stick for a drum, and we strum it!
>
> Kitasi, tired of being nerfed on E'ci

Yesterday, i feedback'ed and petitioned this. (because of a silly mistake
on my part, i thought that they had already nerfed the surfing-- I was
running, using Selo's and had an item picked up with my cursor, so I would
remember to put it in the bank when I got there. Evidently that nullifies
the surfing effect, too)
I know, I probably shouldn't have petitioned, but I was pretty dissapointed
that they would take such a fun element out of the game. To my surprise, I
received a tell from a Guide bard, Allie, who said that she would put in a
good word for us. :)

Elwe, 23 songs in my repertoire, Karana.
